name: camel_case_itproject
description: ePortfolio App for COMP30022 IT Project

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server/ && npm start" "cd client/ && npm start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client/ && npm install && npm run build" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client/ && npm test --watchAll" "cd server/ && npm test"

author: Tuan Dung Nguyen, Lawrence Leong, Liam Saliba, Chan Jie Ho & Yung Cheng Kong
